overlay.title: Facebook Birthday Export
overlay.sub_title: Python script to parse birthdays from Facebook HTML and generate a CSV. The CSV can be later imported in Google calendar

overlay.title: Spree Purchase Order
overlay.sub_title: Ruby gem to add Purchase Order as payment method in Spree

overlay.title: Social Birthday Export
overlay.sub_title: Google Chrome extension to parse birthdays from Facebook and generate a CSV. The CSV can be later imported in Google calendar
